description: Albert Einstein was a theoretical physicist who developed the theory of relativity, one of the two pillars of modern physics.
Jane Austen was an English novelist known primarily for her six major novels, which interpret, critique and comment upon the British landed gentry at the end of the 18th century.
Steve Martin is an American actor, comedian, writer, producer, and musician. He came to public notice in the 1960s as a writer for The Smothers Brothers Comedy Hour.
